title: Business & Finance
text:
---

The SEC proposed measures that would significantly increase its visibility into private-equity funds and some hedge funds.

---

Boeing said production problems and delivery delays with its 787 Dreamliner would cost it another $4.5 billion.

---

Intel 's earnings fell in the latest quarter as the company ramped up spending on new facilities and products.

---

Facebook 's cryptocurrency venture is winding down and selling its technology to Silvergate Capital.

---

Musk said Tesla won't introduce new vehicles this year, as it bets on growth over diversifying its offerings.

---

The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation named four new members to its board of trustees.

---

William Ackman said his hedge fund has acquired a stake in Netflix, attracted by the recent stock selloff.
